body.p: Dear Sir -- I herewith send you for Mr Craycroft affidavits farily verifying the statements of his petition on the receipt of which, you said you would send him a remission -- He has been unavoidably prevented from going to get the affidavits

In the meantime the Sherriff has on his property and will advertise the sale in a few days unless he gets your remission -- He is in a good deal of distress about this and I hope you will relieve him by most --
No local -- all very quiet here
